page.title: 04Lady Sybil of Todmorden Moor
page.content: {Lady Sybil,}as mentioned on another page,married{Lord William}and gave up witchcraft but reverted to her former ways later on. Once again she wandered the area and while playing at{Cliviger {Mill}in the guise of a cat the miller's man cut off one of her paws. She managed to return home and had to face the anger of{Lord William}to whom the missing hand with its costly signet ring had been brought from {Cliviger.}Magical skill restored the hand and{Lady Sybil}was reconciled with her husband. Her strength however was gone and when her soul was rescued from the powers of darkness she died in peace.{Bernshaw Tower,}her former home, was left un-tenanted but for many years it was reported that on{All {Hallows Eve}the spectre of a huntsman with a hound and a milk white doe flitted past{Eagle Crag.}
